QUERY.TITLE: Anti-abortion Movements
QUERY.DESC: Find reports on any action by members of anti-abortion movements or on efforts to restrict or abolish the laws regulating abortion .
QUERY.NARR: Any action by members of the anti-abortion movement , including demonstrations and protest marches , but also specific actions against abortion clinics is of interest . Statements by individuals in favour of abolishing or restricting legal abortion are also relevant .
